headline: RBC Capital Raises ServiceNow (NOW) PT to $1,200 on Strong Q1, ‘Conservative’ Outlook
summary: ServiceNow Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the most profitable growth stocks to buy according to billionaires. On July 24, RBC Capital raised its price target on ServiceNow shares to $1,200 from $1,100, while maintaining an Outperform rating. The firm believes the company’s outlook is conservative for Q2 2025, with a solid upside potential. In Q1 […]

headline: ServiceNow (NOW) to Invest $750 Million in Genesy
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the Best Stocks to Invest in for High Returns. On August 1, ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) announced that it has agreed to invest $750 million in Genesy, which is a leading AI‑Powered Experience Orchestration company. The total investment secured by Genesy amounts to $1.5 billion, with the other $75 million coming […]
